data.name: See You In Desolation?
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

"See You In Desolation?" is a single player, first-person psychological horror game.

You will have to take on the role of Adam - an young man who prefers to stay at much more comfort than real one. And thus Adam prefers not to leave the house unless



Perhaps it would have continued this way, but Adam's story is not as simple as it might seem.

Features:

  • Immersive and realistic gameplay.
  • Experiences of the protagonist are the main focus
  • Realistic graphics
  • Terrifying atmosphere
  • Spatial 3D sound (We recommend using headphones)
  • Automatic save system
  • Flexible system of settings

Warning:

Be careful, this game is not for the faint of heart.
Also not recommended for people with epilepsy.

For complete immersion, it is recommended to play in the evening with headphones on.

data.short_description: "See You In Desolation?" is a single player, first-person psychological horror game. You have to take on the role of Adam - an introverted young man who prefers to be at home all day.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz/AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
